narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Mark Viner is a Psychiatry & Neurology, Psychiatry provider based in Sparks, NV. From 2018-08 through 2019-01, this provider received $69K in Medicaid payments across 930 claims serving 275 beneficiaries, billing 1 distinct procedure codes.

narrative.title: Key Findings
items: 100% of billing is concentrated in 90876 (90876), indicating significant specialization in this service.
Billing stopped in 2019-01, suggesting this provider is no longer active in Medicaid. Abrupt cessation of billing can be a risk indicator.
